nodes.text: The Boneyard was a small valley located on the western edge of the Nightmare Lands on the planet Voss. Named for the massive skeletons of long-dead beasts in the area, the Boneyard was controlled by the Thalak tribe of Gormak, who had battled the Galactic Republic in the area and destroyed at least one Manka-class armored transport. The western cliff was the site of a tunnel leading to Desolation Pass.
The Boneyard appears as a Heroic area on Voss in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
